item.title: Small and medium-sized enterprises and consumers will reap the rewards as banks increase their focus on innovation
item.description: Several financial institutions in the Asia Pacific region were honored at the Asian Financial Services (AFS) Congress 2014 in Singapore for their innovative banking solutions. AllianceBank Malaysia received the “Asia’s Most Customer Friendly Bank” award for its BizSmart Academy initiative, which supports young SMEs through business education, coaching, and seed funding. The program is open to both existing and new customers. The bank provides participants with a year-long curriculum covering management, business, and finance topics.
